title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Python/JS libraries to pull, bundle and run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, Phi, etc. locally with GPU/CPU acceleration and a built-in model registry.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party async/sync Python client; chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models; streaming support; typed Pydantic responses.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface as Python lib with full type definitions.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: Thin LangChain adapter giving ChatOllama & OllamaEmbeddings classes; drop-in replacement for OpenAI in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web frontend; multi-user, RAG via uploaded docs, OpenAI-compatible API endpoint, dark/light themes.

title: Open WebUI (formerly Ollama WebUI)
summary: Community continuation of ollama-webui with plugins, voice input, image generation hooks and extensive admin settings.

title: ollama-cli (mattw/ollama-cli)
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with readline, conversation persistence, syntax highlighting and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot (sammcj/ollama-copilot)
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS-Code extension that routes completions to any Ollama model; supports infill suggestions and streaming.

title: ollama-sk (microsoft/semantic-kernel)
summary: Microsoft Semantic Kernel connector enabling Ollama models as chat & text-completion backends for SK planners and plugins.

title: ollama4j (ollama4j/ollama4j)
summary: Java/Kotlin client library wrapping Ollama REST endpoints; synchronous & async APIs, POJO models, Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rag (ggerganov/ollama-rag)
summary: Minimal C++ example of retrieval-augmented generation using Ollama + llama.cpp embeddings and FAISS for vector search.

title: ollama-haystack (deepset-ai/haystack-ollama)
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator & OllamaChatGenerator components for building RAG & agent pipelines.

title: ollama-cord (omlins/ollama-cord)
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses in threads; slash commands, context windows, per-guild model settings.

title: ollama-ex (elixir-ollama/ollama_ex)
summary: Elixir wrapper with GenServer behaviour, telemetry events and LiveView hooks for real-time chat in Phoenix apps.

title: ollama-rs (pepperoni21/ollama-rs)
summary: Async Rust crate exposing strongly-typed APIs for chat, generate, pull and embeddings; tokio & reqwest under the hood.

title: ollama-camunda (camunda-community-hub/ollama-camunda)
summary: Community task worker that invokes Ollama models inside Camunda 8 process engines for human-in-the-loop AI steps.

title: ollama-helm (jdetroye/ollama-helm)
summary: Helm chart deploying Ollama server and optional WebUI onto Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and PVC model cache.
